"Hard to say- this ability is new to me. At the moment
I can only detect Maximals with strong emotions- in
time I guess that will change though."


  --- airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote: 
---------------------------------
Nighlight:::

"So..."though the femme"YOu can know what I'm
thinking... what can 
others think...?"
Nighlight thought what would happen if she could know
what happned 
in others minds, she looked her little daughter and
she smiled... 
what could Elita think about her about all things that
happens 
around her?


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Polar Claw
<cycodrone@y...> wrote:
> Shadowcaster was taken aback. It looks like this was

> seems like somehow I've become telepathic. What I
sent
> to you is true though."
> 
>  --- airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote: 
> ---------------------------------
> Nighlight::
> 
> "The other side"though confused the femme but she
> pressed the 
> comlink 3 as Shadimus asked
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Polar Claw
> <cycodrone@y...> wrote:
> > Shadimus found this interesting, was this
> Nightlight's
> > vioce he was hearing- had he developed the ability
> to
> > commune with other sparks? There was only one way
to
> > know for sure.
> > 
> > "Just call me your friendly neighbourhood ancient
> > Cybertronian." he sent with a wink. "Don't ask me
> how
> > this is happening if it really is, but maybe it
has
> to
> > do with me coming back from the other side. I need
> > proof- if this is really happening, quickly turn
on
> > and off your comm link 3."
> > 
> > Shadowcaster waited for a reply.
> > 
> >  --- airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote: 
> > ---------------------------------
> > Nighlight::
> > 
> > "Who???? How???"Nighlight thought, she only knew
> that
> > only a bot 
> > could contact sparks and she tought that.. no he
> > wasn't he couldn't 
> > be; his spark once kind and warn was become
evil...
> > so, who was?? 
> > before that she could tought more a warn and
> > conforting feeling 
> > sorround her and she started to feel comforted.
She
> > thought "Who're 
> > you?"
> > 
> > 
> >

> > > Shadowcaster could sense something was wrong
with
> > one
> > > of the crew, something which while not greatly

> of
> > a
> > > Transformer.

> > > 'Is this what happens to bots who come back from
> the
> > > other side?' he thought to himself.
> > > 
> > > Drawing on zen meditation techniques which he'd
> > > downloaded during one trip to earth during the
> great
> > > war, Shadowcaster let himself relax, letting the
> > > sensation take hold, before focusing on where it
> > might
> > > be coming from, the vague details becoming more
> > > specific, until he finally had a clear picture
in

spark,

> > >

who

feelings
